sqlRow.sql: select rna.description, rna.organism from dots.RNA where rna.rna_id = $$RNAid$$

sqlRowSet.sql: select ed.name as extName, dbr.primary_identifier as extPrimId, dbr.secondary_identifier as extSecId, dbr.chromosome as extChrom, dbr.centimorgans as extCentimorg, dbr.external_database_release_id as extDbRlsId from dots.DBRefNASequence dbrn, sres.DBRef dbr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr where dbrn.na_sequence_id = $$RNAid$$ and dbrn.db_ref_id = dbr.db_ref_id and dbr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id
sqlRowSet.content: The best thing about rna $$RNAid$$ is its organism: $$organism$$
